test_MillikanWhite.cpp

1 #include "MillikanWhite.h"
2 #include "Mixture.h"
3 #include "TemporaryFile.h"
4 #include <catch.hpp>
5 
6 using namespace Mutation;
7 using namespace Mutation::Transfer;
8 using namespace Catch;
9 
10 void checkDefaultModelData(bool with_electrons)
11 {
12  const std::string species_list = (with_electrons ? "e- N2 O2 N" : "N2 O2 N");
13  const size_t offset = (with_electrons ? 1 : 0);
14 
15  MixtureOptions opts;
16  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor(species_list);
17  Mixture mix(opts);
18 
19  const double thetav = 3408.464;
20  MillikanWhiteModelData data(mix, offset, thetav);
21 
22  CHECK(data.speciesIndex() == offset);
23  CHECK(data.molecularWeight() == mix.speciesMw(offset));
24  CHECK(data.referenceCrossSection() == 1.0e-20);
25  CHECK(data.limitingCrossSection(mix.T()) == 1.0e-20 * (2.5e9/(mix.T()*mix.T())));
26  REQUIRE(data.a().size() == 3);
27  REQUIRE(data.b().size() == 3);
28 
29  const double mw = mix.speciesMw(offset);
30 
31  for (size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
32  {
33  const double mwi = mix.speciesMw(i+offset);
34  const double mu = 1000.0*mw*mwi/(mw+mwi); // g/mol
35 
36  CHECK(data.a()[i] == 1.16e-3*std::sqrt(mu)*std::pow(thetav, 4.0/3.0));
37  CHECK(data.b()[i] == 0.015*std::pow(mu, 0.25));
38  }
39 }
40 
44 TEST_CASE("MillikanWhiteModelData provides default model values", "[transfer]")
45 {
46  checkDefaultModelData(false);
47  checkDefaultModelData(true);
48 }
49 
50 void checkDefaultRelaxationRate(bool with_electrons)
51 {
52  INFO(std::string("with_electrons = ") + (with_electrons ? "true" : "false"));
53  const std::string species_list = (with_electrons ? "e- N2" : "N2");
54  const size_t offset = (with_electrons ? 1 : 0);
55 
56  MixtureOptions opts;
57  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor(species_list);
58  opts.setStateModel("ChemNonEq1T");
59  Mixture mix(opts);
60 
61  const double thetav = 3408.464;
62  MillikanWhiteModel model({mix, offset, thetav});
63 
64  const int SET_Y_AND_PT = 2;
65 
66  std::vector<double> y;
67  if (with_electrons)
68  y.push_back(0.0);
69  y.push_back(1.0);
70 
71  const double pT[] = { ONEATM, 300.0 };
72  mix.setState(y.data(), pT, SET_Y_AND_PT);
73 
74  const double mu = 1000.0*0.5*mix.speciesMw(offset);
75  const double A = 1.16e-3*std::sqrt(mu)*std::pow(thetav, 4.0/3.0);
76  const double B = 0.015*std::pow(mu, 0.25);
77  const double tau_mw = std::exp(A*(std::pow(300.0, -1.0/3.0) - B) - 18.42);
78 
79  const double ni = mix.numberDensity();
80  const double ci = std::sqrt(8*RU*300.0/(PI*mix.speciesMw(offset)));
81  const double sigma = 1e-20 * (2.5E9/(300.0*300.0));
82  const double tau_park = 1.0/(ni * ci * sigma);
83 
84  CHECK(model.relaxationTime(mix) == Approx(tau_mw + tau_park));
85 }
86 
87 TEST_CASE("MillikanWhiteModel provides correct default relaxation time", "[transfer]")
88 {
89  checkDefaultRelaxationRate(false);
90  checkDefaultRelaxationRate(true);
91 }
92 
93 TEST_CASE("Can load MillikanWhiteModel from database", "[transfer]")
94 {
95  // Create a temporary database
96  Mutation::Utilities::IO::TemporaryFile file(".xml");
97  file << R"(
98  <VT>
99  <Millikan-White>
100  <vibrator species="N2" omegav="3.0E-21">
101  <partner species="N" a="180.0" b ="0.0262" />
102  <partner species="N2" a="221" b="0.0290" />
103  </vibrator>
104  </Millikan-White>
105  </VT>)";
106  file.close();
107 
108  MixtureOptions opts;
109  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor("N2 N");
110  Mixture mix(opts);
111 
112  MillikanWhiteModelDB db(mix, file.filename());
113 
114  auto model = db.create("N2", 3408.464);
115 
116  CHECK(model.speciesIndex() == 0);
117  CHECK(model.molecularWeight() == mix.speciesMw(0));
118  CHECK(model.data().a().size() == 2);
119  CHECK(model.data().b().size() == 2);
120 
121  CHECK(model.data().a()[0] == 221.0);
122  CHECK(model.data().b()[0] == 0.0290);
123 
124  CHECK(model.data().a()[1] == 180.0);
125  CHECK(model.data().b()[1] == 0.0262);
126 }
